sentences.english: An investigation was made on the beneficiation of primary ilmenite using spirals made in China.
sentences.chinese: 採用國產螺旋選礦機進行了原生鈦鐵礦的選礦研究。

sentences.english: Ilmenite resources are found to be widely distributed in great reserves.
sentences.chinese: 鈦鐵礦資源儲量大，分佈廣。

sentences.english: Haematite is a special case of the more general ilmenite structure.
sentences.chinese: 赤鐵礦是更爲一般的鈦鐵礦型結構中一個特殊的情況。

sentences.english: Its chief commercial ores are ilmenite and rutile .
sentences.chinese: 有商業價值的主要礦石是鈦鐵礦和金紅石。
